dict.acceptation: 餐，饭；进餐（时间）；〈英〉一次挤奶量；谷物粗粉（用作饲料或加工面粉）；

sent.orig: Corn gluten meal (CGM) is difficult to dissolve in water.
sent.trans: 玉米蛋白(Com Gluten Meal)水溶性差，组成复杂，口感粗糙，严重影响了其在食品中的应用。

sent.orig: These include; Fish Meal, Meat and Bone Meal, Blood Meal and Feather Meal.
sent.trans: 鱼，肉骨粉，血粉和羽毛粉等。

sent.orig: White Chia Meal-Sold by container, pallet, bag. 100% of oil content is intact in the meal.
sent.trans: 白家粉-出售集装箱，货盘袋。100％的内容是完整的石油在餐。

sent.orig: When meal, should better be can open the eat three meals a day 56 meal eats.
sent.trans: 在吃饭时，最好是能将一日三餐拆成五六餐来吃。

sent.orig: Please take three times a day after every meal (before every meal) .
sent.trans: 每日三次，饭后（饭前）服用。
